attributes.action: Governent Should Support Clubs For The Elderly.
attributes.additional_details:
The issue of caring for the elderly is important because the human race is surviving for longer due to new successful health treatments. This means the number of elderly people in the UK has increased, and there are not enough clubs to help.
We call upon the goverment to help support clubs for the elderly, by advertising local clubs and increasing funding for such clubs.
Sign this petition if you agree.
